sentences.sContent: Yet there is no cheating involved in any of the photographs. No steel rods, no magnets, no computer trickery. The only glue he uses is Nature's. Gravity.
sentences.sContent_eng: Yet there is no cheating involved in any of the photographs. No steel rods, no magnets, no computer trickery. The only glue he uses is Nature's. Gravity.
sentences.sCn: 然而，其中任何一张照片都没有涉及到欺骗。那里没有钢条、没有磁铁也没有电脑欺骗。他使用的唯一粘合剂是大自然的重力。

words.tran: 特技的；欺诈的；有决窍的
欺骗的，狡猾的；恶作剧的；顽皮的
诡计；恶作剧；窍门；花招；骗局；欺诈
诡计多端；狡猾；棘手；欺骗

trans.tranOther: the use of tricks to deceive or cheat people
